title: SOLD - FS: T206 x 20 - lot or individual
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: SOLD - FS: T206 x 20 - lot or individual
posts.post_content:
Here are 20 T206 for sale as a lot or individual.  Lot buy takes precedence over individual sales.   $475 shipped for the lot.  SOLD

All prices are shipped.

Condition notes:

Hummel - name on Top and Bottom 
Abbaticchio
Burchell - stain on sleeve - bottom left corner crease
Hayden - slight diamond cut
Schmidt
Bridwell
Barger
Barry - bottom left corner wrinkle
Ball
Ames - top right corner crease
Hahn - lower left corner crease, "350" on back is scratched with pencil?
Frill - upper right corner wrinkle
Davis (SC Fact. 649 overstrike) - crease through middle, crease lower right, initialled lower right
Delehanty (SC Fact. 649 overstrike) - multiple creases
Dineen - lower right corner touch
Raymond - name on top and bottom
Fromme - wrinkle to the left of his arm
Fletcher x 3 - one of them has a "9" written in pencil in blue sky

[IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/IMG_0001-3.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/IMG_0002-1.jpg[/IMG]

Hi Jay, I'll take the lot.

[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Please advise on your preferred way for me to pay.

Thanks

Thanks Trae,

Shipping out today.  Will forward tracking via email.
